content:
WSTrustServiceHost Class

In this Article

Provides a ServiceHost for registering a SecurityTokenService The service host will have multiple endpoints registered based on the number of listeners registered in the configuration.

Syntax

Declaration

public class WSTrustServiceHost : System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • CommunicationObject
  • ServiceHostBase
  • System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost
  • WSTrustServiceHost

Remarks

By default, the WSTrustServiceHost class provides the following:

  • It adds WS-Trust endpoints to the ServiceHost based on the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration.TrustEndpoints%2A> property.

  • It enables metadata over the base addresses if the DisableWsdl property is set to false.

  • It configures the service certificate on the ServiceHost service credentials if a WIF configuration section specifies a service certificate. Note that this will override the equivalent service certificate settings in WCF configuration.

  • It integrates IdentityModel token handlers into the security processing pipeline by calling the ExtensibleSecurityCredentials.ConfigureServiceHost method on itself.

    The WSTrustServiceHost class may be overridden to customize this behavior.

Constructors summary

WSTrustServiceHost(SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration,Uri[])

Initializes a new instance of the WSTrustServiceHost class with the specified base addresses and service (STS) configuration settings.
WSTrustServiceHost(WSTrustServiceContract,Uri[])

Initializes a new instance of the WSTrustServiceHost class with the specified base addresses and service contract.

Properties summary

SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration

Gets the security token service (STS) configuration for this this instance.
ServiceContract

Gets the service contract associated with this instance.

Methods summary

ApplyConfiguration()

Loads the service description information from the configuration file and applies it to the runtime that is being constructed.
ConfigureMetadata()

Configures metadata (WSDL) for the service host.
InitializeRuntime()

Override of the base class method. Configures the ServiceConfiguration on the service host and then invokes the base implementation.
UpdateServiceConfiguration()

Overrides the stem.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceCredentials.IdentityConfiguration* on the stem.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase.Credentials* property of the service host with the stem.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceHost.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration* property.

Constructors

  • WSTrustServiceHost(SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration,Uri[])

    Initializes a new instance of the WSTrustServiceHost class with the specified base addresses and service (STS) configuration settings.

    public WSTrustServiceHost (System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration securityTokenServiceConfiguration, Uri[] baseAddresses);

    Parameters

    • securityTokenServiceConfiguration
      SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration

      A SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration that contains the STS settings to use to initialize the service host.

    • baseAddresses
      Uri[]

      An array of Uri that contains the base addresses for the service host.

    Remarks

    A default WSTrustServiceContract is created using the specified SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration instance.

    The SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration instance is used for one-time initialization of the ServiceHost; for this reason, setting properties on the configuration instance after the host is initialized may not result in behavior changes.

  • WSTrustServiceHost(WSTrustServiceContract,Uri[])

    Initializes a new instance of the WSTrustServiceHost class with the specified base addresses and service contract.

    public WSTrustServiceHost (System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceContract serviceContract, Uri[] baseAddresses);

    Parameters

    • serviceContract
      WSTrustServiceContract

      A WSTrustServiceContract that represents the service contract to use.

    • baseAddresses
      Uri[]

      An array of Uri that contains the base addresses for the service host.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentNullException

      baseAddresses is null.

      -or-

      serviceContract is null.

Properties

  • SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration

    Gets the security token service (STS) configuration for this this instance.

    public System.IdentityModel.Configuration.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration { get; }

    Property Value

    • SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration

      The STS configuration.

  • ServiceContract

    Gets the service contract associated with this instance.

    public System.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceContract ServiceContract { get; }

    Property Value

    • WSTrustServiceContract

      The service contract for this instance.

Methods

  • ApplyConfiguration()

    Loads the service description information from the configuration file and applies it to the runtime that is being constructed.

    protected override void ApplyConfiguration ();
  • ConfigureMetadata()

    Configures metadata (WSDL) for the service host.

    protected virtual void ConfigureMetadata ();

    Remarks

    This method evaluates the base addresses of the service host, and adds mex endpoints for http, https, net.tcp, and net.pipe addresses, only when no mex endpoints have been previously added by the user. For http and https addresses, HTTP and HTTPS, the GET mechanism for WSDL retrieval is enabled.

  • InitializeRuntime()

    Override of the base class method. Configures the ServiceConfiguration on the service host and then invokes the base implementation.

    protected override void InitializeRuntime ();

    Remarks

    Invokes the UpdateServiceConfiguration method and then invokes the base implementation.

  • UpdateServiceConfiguration()

    Overrides the stem.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceCredentials.IdentityConfiguration* on the stem.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase.Credentials* property of the service host with the stem.ServiceModel.Security.WSTrustServiceHost.SecurityTokenServiceConfiguration* property.

    protected virtual void UpdateServiceConfiguration ();
